documentation.text: @notice Get all tokens belonging to the staker
@notice Get all flags for the staker

@notice Get the last committed staker's period
 @param _staker Staker
@notice Get worker using staker's address
@notice Get work that completed by the staker

@notice Bond worker
 @param _worker Worker address. Must be a real address, not a contract

@notice Set `reStake` parameter. If true then all staking rewards will be added to locked stake
 @param _reStake Value for parameter

@notice Activate/deactivate taking snapshots of balances
 @param _enableSnapshots True to activate snapshots, False to deactivate
@notice Remove unused sub-stake to decrease gas cost for several methods

@notice Withdraw available amount of tokens to staker
 @param _value Amount of tokens to withdraw
@notice Make a commitment to the next period and mint for the previous period
@notice Mint tokens for previous periods if staker locked their tokens and made a commitment
@notice Return the length of the array of stakers
@notice Return the length of the array of sub stakes
@notice Return the information about sub stake
@notice Return the length of the array of past downtime
@notice Return the information about past downtime
@dev the `onlyWhileUpgrading` modifier works through a call to the parent `verifyState`
@dev the `onlyWhileUpgrading` modifier works through a call to the parent `finishUpgrade`

params._worker: Worker address. Must be a real address, not a contract

commitToNextPeriod().notice: Make a commitment to the next period and mint for the previous period

deposit(address,uint256,uint16).notice: Deposit tokens and create new sub-stake. Use this method to become a staker

params._periods: Amount of periods during which tokens will be locked

depositAndIncrease(uint256,uint256).details: This is preferable way to stake tokens because will be fewer active sub-stakes in the result
depositAndIncrease(uint256,uint256).notice: Deposit tokens and increase lock amount of an existing sub-stake

params._value: Amount of tokens which will be locked

params._periods: Amount of periods during which tokens will be locked

divideStake(uint256,uint256,uint16).notice: Divide sub stake into two parts

params._periods: Amount of periods for extending sub stake

findIndexOfPastDowntime(address,uint16).details: If specified period is outside all downtime periods, the length of the array will be returned
findIndexOfPastDowntime(address,uint16).notice: Find index of downtime structure that includes specified period

finishUpgrade(address).details: the `onlyWhileUpgrading` modifier works through a call to the parent `finishUpgrade`

getActiveStakers(uint16,uint256,uint256).details: Note that activeStakers[0] in an array of uint256, but you want addresses. Careful when used directly!
getActiveStakers(uint16,uint256,uint256).notice: Get the value of locked tokens for active stakers in (getCurrentPeriod() + _periods) period as well as stakers and their locked tokens

params._maxStakers: Max stakers for looking, if set 0 then all will be used
params._periods: Amount of periods for locked tokens calculation
params._startIndex: Start index for looking in stakers array

returns.activeStakers: Array of stakers and their locked tokens. Stakers addresses stored as uint256
returns.allLockedTokens: Sum of locked tokens for active stakers

getAllTokens(address).notice: Get all tokens belonging to the staker

getCompletedWork(address).notice: Get work that completed by the staker

getFlags(address).notice: Get all flags for the staker

getLastCommittedPeriod(address).notice: Get the last committed staker's period

getLastPeriodOfSubStake(address,uint256).notice: Get the last period of the sub stake

getLockedTokens(address,uint16).details: This function is used by PreallocationEscrow so its signature can't be updated.
getLockedTokens(address,uint16).notice: Get the value of locked tokens for a staker in a future period

params._periods: Amount of periods that will be added to the current period

getPastDowntime(address,uint256).notice: Return the information about past downtime

getPastDowntimeLength(address).notice: Return the length of the array of past downtime

getStakersLength().notice: Return the length of the array of stakers

getSubStakeInfo(address,uint256).notice: Return the information about sub stake

getSubStakesLength(address).notice: Return the length of the array of sub stakes

lockAndCreate(uint256,uint16).notice: Lock some tokens as a new sub-stake

params._periods: Amount of periods during which tokens will be locked
params._value: Amount of tokens which will be locked

lockAndIncrease(uint256,uint256).notice: Increase lock amount of an existing sub-stake

params._value: Amount of tokens which will be locked

mergeStake(uint256,uint256).details: It's possible that both sub-stakes will be active after this transaction. But only one of them will be active until next call `commitToNextPeriod` (in the next period)
mergeStake(uint256,uint256).notice: Merge two sub-stakes into one if their last periods are equal

mint().notice: Mint tokens for previous periods if staker locked their tokens and made a commitment

params._periods: Amount of periods for extending sub stake

receiveApproval(address,uint256,address,.notice: Implementation of the receiveApproval(address,uint256,address,bytes) method (see NuCypherToken contract). Deposit all tokens that were approved to transfer(param _extraData) Amount of periods during which tokens will be locked

removeUnusedSubStake(uint16).notice: Remove unused sub-stake to decrease gas cost for several methods

setReStake(bool).notice: Set `reStake` parameter. If true then all staking rewards will be added to locked stake

params._enableSnapshots: True to activate snapshots, False to deactivate

setWindDown(bool).notice: Set `windDown` parameter. If true then stake's duration will be decreasing in each period with `commitToNextPeriod()`

setWorkMeasurement(address,bool).notice: Start or stop measuring the work of a staker

slashStaker(address,uint256,address,uint.notice: Slash the staker's stake and reward the investigator

verifyState(address).details: the `onlyWhileUpgrading` modifier works through a call to the parent `verifyState`

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw available amount of tokens to staker

natspec.notice: Contract holds and locks stakers tokens. Each staker that locks their tokens will receive some compensation
natspec.title: StakingEscrow
